name: RAGE KABUKING
description:
What's Yokailand's soul...?

Without a doubt, KABUKI!

Food for mind and heart!

... That was in the past.

Now, the shogun has declared:

"Death to kabuki!!"

A lone fighter walks

Towards the shogun's castle

Ready for a fight

Drama in his heart!

Raging fire in his throat!

Fight, RAGE KABUKING!!

RAGE KABUKING is a score-based top-down twin-stick shooter, developed for the LOWREZJAM 2022, under the "Kill it with Fire" theme. Climb up the endless fiend-infested tower, completing The Shogun's trials of power, wit, speed, evasion and pickpocketing. Try to rack up the highest score you can before you lose it all.

==TEAM HI-OCTANE VIOLENCE==

-CSketch (Enemy Design, Level Design)

-RRThiel (Music, Sound Design, Graphics, Enemy Design)

-MiniMacro Sound (Programming, Level Design, Graphics, Music)

==DEFAULT CONTROLS==

The game allows the player to rebind the controls to their liking, such as using mouse and keyboard, exclusively a keyboard, or a controller. 

The default controls, however, are the WASD keys for movement and either the arrow keys or mouse for firing.

Additionally, there are two special keys: the F1 key will reset the game, while the F2 key will reset the current room (for a small score penalty).

== KABUKING IS NUMBER 1!!! ==
